quote: Look.” He stepped closer, his voice lowered to a gruff murmur, and lifted her chin with his finger, forcing her to meet his gaze – which just made her want to stretch up and kiss him.
quote_letters: LOOK HE STEPPED CLOSER HIS VOICE LOWERED TO A GRUFF MURMUR AND LIFTED HER CHIN WITH HIS FINGER FORCING HER TO MEET HIS GAZE - WHICH JUST MADE HER WANT TO STRETCH UP AND KISS HIM
